channel.title: [PI] Setting Defence Emote to NPC [PI]
channel.description: Ok. So I got the attacking emotes down. But I searched like everywhere and I could not find the freaking defense emotes! If someone could please direct me to the file that their in that would be great! If you didn't read the title this is a project insanity base.
